item.title: CVE-2024-33941|2024-05-03T07:26:32.006Z -- Avirtum -- iPanorama 360 WordPress Virtual Tour Builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Avirtum iPanorama 360 WordPress Virtual Tour Builder.This issue affects iPanorama 360 WordPress Virtual Tour Builder: from n/a through 1.8.1.
